name: Play A Jigsaw
description:
This is a very simple APP , there is no auxiliary function to help you finish the jigsaw.
Of course, there is also no Ads and in APP purchase.
You can import your own picture as a jigsaw .
Application include 11 jigsaw , but the picture of include jigsaw is also very simple.
So, you need know the picture of include jigsaw will not be good .

Featuring(can not know from the screenshot):
- Auto saving
- Double click to lock or unlock the piece
